amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-42 to require a National Academy of Sciences report on the consequences of withdrawing from the Paris Agreement for the United States' global economic competitiveness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
